question: What is the purpose of the Code of Conduct adopted by Facebook?
answer: The Code of Conduct adopted by Facebook sets expectations for project participants to adhere to, in order to understand what actions will and will not be tolerated.

question: Where can the full text of Facebook's Code of Conduct be found?
answer: The full text of Facebook's Code of Conduct can be found at https://code.fb.com/codeofconduct/.
